column1: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand. Isaiah 41 verse 10

column2: "plans to prosper you and not to harm you
column3: plans to give you a hope and a future." Jeremiah 29 verse 11

Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly as you teach and admonish one another with all wisdom. Colossians 3 verse 16
He has made everything beautiful in its time. Ecclesiastes 3 verse 11
Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer. Romans 12 verse 12
I have told you these things, so that in Me you may have peace. In this world, you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world. John 16 verse 33
Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here! 2 Corinthians 5 verse 17
For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also. Matthew 6 verse 21
Finally, be strong in the Lord and in His mighty power. Ephesians 6 verse 10
Jesus replied: ‘Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind.’ Matthew 22 verse 37
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. John 14 verse 27
Let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us. Hebrews 12 verse 1
He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak. Isaiah 40 verse 29
The Lord is my refuge and my fortress, my God, in whom I trust. Psalm 91 verse 2
Take delight in the Lord, and He will give you the desires of your heart. Psalm 37 verse 4
All things are possible with God. Mark 10 verse 27
I have set the Lord always before me. Because He is at my right hand, I will not be shaken. Psalm 16 verse 8
Those who know Your name trust in You, for You, Lord, have never forsaken those who seek You. Psalm 9 verse 10
Then He said to them, 'Go into all the world and preach the gospel to all creation.' Mark 16 verse 15
Let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth. 1 John 3 verse 18
Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted. Matthew 5 verse 4
Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here! 2 Corinthians 5 verse 17
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Challenges are what make life interesting; overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
With God, all things are possible.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
Don’t stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Great things are not done by impulse, but by a series of small things brought together.
Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
Success is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Success comes from the inside out. Don’t quit on yourself.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
God has a plan for you, a future and a hope.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Don’t be discouraged. It’s often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Great things take time, and the secret is to never give up.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
Let all that you do be done in love.
Faith without works is dead.
